CustomField.description: previously ASSP Partner, previously Servicing Partner
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Partner Delivered Service Program for hardware servicing Solution Providers that sell and deliver their own installation and maintenance services to their Customers as they receive full support from NCR. They are given access to the NCR Services infrastructure including parts accessibility, service delivery training, intellectual property, software access/updates and technical support.
CustomField.label: PDS Partner
